name: I love to see you, darling!
description: I love to see you, darling, awake or in your sleep. I touch you with my eyes, embrace you in my thoughts, dissolve in you and drink.  I love to see you, darling, when standing on your toes, to kiss, to find, to touch me and own me once again  I love to see you darling, when mad, or run or hide… to find your touch again, to breathe deeply in your hair and hug and fly and dream. Drawing by Poly and Writing by Dany. Dry Pastel on paper.
